title: Allo Allo 01 kuni 17 eesti subtiitrid

Mul on kurb, et sellist suurepÃƒÂ¤rast seriaali nii vÃƒÂ¤he teatakse. Loodan, et mul ÃƒÂµnnestub aidata kaasa "Allo Allo" populaarsuse suurenemisele.

* * *

I am doing this as a public service because "Allo Allo" is easily the best TV series I have ever seen, and the official Estonian translation is an appalling bungle.

It is a great pity that so few people know "Allo Allo". My goal is to make it more popular.

Surprisingly, the series is almost impossible to buy. The British 19-DVD set has, unfortunately, cropped Episode 84, and has poor picture quality. The DVDs issued in Estonia have a much better picture quality than any others I have seen, but they discontinued the series inamidst of Season 5, undoubtedly due to poor sales. That is to say that you have no right to whine about your copyright until you have officially published the entire series uncut and in qood quality.
